veganoption.waila.retting.not_submerged: Needs to be submerged in water
block.veganoption.bundled_jute.vowiki.us: In order to extract the [[veganoption:jute_fibre]], %1$s must be first be retted(submerged in water). [[minecraft:comparator]] output is based on the current retting stage of the %1$s.
item.veganoption.jute_fibre.vowiki.craft: %1$s is obtained by breaking fully retted [[veganoption:bundled_jute]].
item.veganoption.jute_seeds.vowiki.usage: An alternative method of propagating a [[minecraft:double_plant:3]]. Can be planted on dirt, grass, or farmland.
item.veganoption.straw_bed.vowiki.usage: %1$s is a [[minecraft:bed]]. However, it's a bit itchy: it deals 1/2 heart of damage whenever it is used.
death.attack.veganoption.itchy_bed: %1$s itched themselves to death in their sleep
death.attack.veganoption.itchy_bed.playe: %1$s itched themselves to death in their sleep whilst trying to escape %2$s
veganoption:plant_milk_bucket.vowiki.cra: Note: %1$s can only be crafted using two of the same items as the plant milk source.
veganoption:plant_milk_bucket.vowiki.usa: If you're looking for the curative effects that the Minecraft [[minecraft:milk_bucket]] gives, use [[veganoption:soap]] instead.
item.veganoption.plastic_egg.vowiki.usag: A %1$s is an [[minecraft:egg]] alternative for non-baking purposes.
block.veganoption.composter.vowiki.usage:
A %1$s can be used to turn plant matter into [[veganoption:compost]] or [[veganoption:rotten_plants]].

To create [[veganoption:compost]], fill the %1$s with a mixture of "green" and "brown" materials. To create [[veganoption:rotten_plants]], only use "green" materials. See the "{veganoption.vowiki.composting}" tab for the list of "green" and "brown" materials.

The higher the temperature inside the composter, the faster the material will decompose. The speed that the temperature increases is determined by 3 factors:

1) The last time the compost was tumbled (sneak + use the %1$s with an empty hand to tumble it)

2) The fullness of the composter (the more full it is, the faster it will decompose)

3) The ratio of "green" to "brown" materials (a ratio of 2:1 provides the maximum speed)

If the %1$s has not been tumbled in a while, it will start to lose its heat. Every time the %1$s is tumbled, it will lose heat initially, but will gain more heat in the long run. The %1$s should be tumbled about twice every Minecraft day.

[[minecraft:comparator]] output from the %1$s is based on its current temperature.
veganoption.gui.composter.name: Composter
veganoption.gui.composter.tumble.desc: Every time the composter is tumbled, it will lose heat initially, but will gain more heat in the long run. The composter should be tumbled about twice every Minecraft day.
veganoption.gui.composter.temperature.de:
Temperature increase is determined by:
- The last time the composter was tumbled
- The fullness of the composter
- The ratio of "green" to "brown" materials (a ratio of 2:1 is ideal)
veganoption.gui.composter.composting.des: The higher the temperature inside the composter, the faster the material will decompose.
death.attack.veganoption.lye_water.playe: %1$s bathed in lye whilst trying to escape %2$s
item.veganoption.soap.vowiki.usage: When %1$s is used, it will remove all status effects from the player.
item.veganoption.soap_solution.vowiki.us: %1$s can be used to create a {entity.veganoption.bubble.name}. It can be used by either a player or a [[minecraft:dispenser]].
item.veganoption.frozen_bubble.vowiki.cr: A %1$s can be created by using [[veganoption:soap_solution]] to create a {entity.veganoption.bubble.name} in a very cold area (surrounded by [[minecraft:ice]]/[[minecraft:snow]]).
item.veganoption.frozen_bubble_filled.vo: A %1$s can be created by placing a [[veganoption:frozen_bubble]] in [[veganoption:raw_ender]].
A %1$s can be turned into an [[minecraft:ender_pearl]] by filling it completely with [[veganoption:raw_ender]].
block.veganoption.encrusted_obsidian.vow: An [[veganoption:ender_rift]] can be created by placing 4 %1$s blocks in a diamond shape with a gap in the center.
block.veganoption.raw_ender.vowiki.craft: Water flowing through an [[veganoption:ender_rift]] at night has a chance to be converted into %1$s. However, if this is done during the day, a random block around the [[veganoption:ender_rift]] will be consumed by it and lost forever.
item.veganoption.false_morel.vowiki.usag: A %1$s is a toxic mushroom that can be used as a [[minecraft:spider_eye]] alternative.
item.veganoption.dolls_eye.vowiki.common: A %1$s is the poisonous berry of the plant Actaea Pachypoda (also known as white baneberry).
item.veganoption.dolls_eye.vowiki.crafti: {item.veganoption.dolls_eye.vowiki.common}\n\n%1$s can only be found by breaking [[minecraft:tallgrass:1]] in temperate forest biomes.
block.veganoption.basin.vowiki.usage: %1$s is a simple fluid tank that holds up to 1 buckets worth of fluid. By default, it has a lid, but when a redstone signal is applied, the lid is removed and it acts as a fluid hopper (fluid blocks will flow into it).\n\nWhen container items (buckets, bottles, etc) are dropped inside an open %1$s, they will be filled with the fluid inside the %1$s if possible.
Fluid inputs must be displaced by the piston
Fluid outputs require a fluid handler (tank, drum, etc) below the piston head
